forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
